lead_paragraph: How’s this for a big day on the absurd-o-meter: Kobe Bryant hacks up a fur ball in a signature moment and the team-of-the-century Red Wings hack up a whole cat with a chance to clinch the Stanley Cup.
snippet: How’s this for a big day on the absurd-o-meter: Kobe Bryant hacks up a fur ball in a signature moment and the team-of-the-century Red Wings hack up a whole cat with a chance to clinch the Stanley Cup.
